meanings.definition: A dramatized television or film production based on real events.
meanings.sent1: The docudrama about the famous explorer was very interesting.
meanings.sent2: I watched a docudrama about a historical event last night.
meanings.sent3: The docudrama about the space mission had me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a docudrama, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The docudrama brought history to life in a captivating way.

meanings.definition: A genre of television or film that combines elements of documentary and drama.
meanings.sent1: The docudrama genre is gaining popularity among viewers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching docudramas because they feel realistic.
meanings.sent3: The docudrama genre adds an exciting twist to storytelling.
meanings.sent4: Her life story could be a docudrama with all its ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The docudrama genre offers a unique blend of facts and fiction.
